The breeze is stronger than my regular fan so I'm happy with it.

I purchased the DREO tower fan because I was looking for something quiet.I live in Las Vegas and by choice can go for a long time without turning on the AC.I just needed something quiet to move air.I am very pleased with this fan. It is quiet. I have it placed 54" from me on the lowest settingof 1 to 4, and it fits my needs.Revised 80 days later: Starting to hear a little more noise when using settings 2-4.Revised again just shy of four months. While still quiet and on the lowest setting, starting to hear faint pulse or hum that sounds like it is coming from that of a large ceiling fan.

The fan works fine but it is very hard to see the readout. I have to get very close. The remote has the same problem.  Also, the functions are too many and it’s easy to get off track struggling to find the right buttons  This machine has not been thoughtfully designed for easy use.

reviewTitle: Great fan out of the box, lifespan shortens quickly
reviewDescription: I was blown away (no pun intended) by the power of this fan when I first purchased. Air was cold as the arctic and could be felt ~15 feet away.After 1-2 months of continual use, doesn’t seem as powerful as before. Perhaps because I leave it on all day.

reviewTitle: Nosy, (not in a good way) but works as a fan
reviewDescription: Had this fan 6 months. Used probably 4 of the months in the evenings for 8 hours. Started to make whiney noises 4 months in. At first, noise disapated, but now it's constistant. Bought the fan cause it said it was quiet. Would only recommend if you can sleep with a buzzing/whiney noise. Also, have only used the fan on the "1" setting.
It's working great but not enoughto my living room.

I’ve had this fan for 5 1/2 weeks now and it has been amazing so far. BUT I accidentally left it on for a couple days straight and now it changes levels on its own without me pressing the buttons. It sounds like it just wants to give up sometimes. I know that it might be my fault if it’s doing that because I did forget to turn it off at times but kinda bummed that it can’t handle a few days of accidentally being left on :/ especially since it hasn’t even been long since I bought it. I say that if you buy this fan just make sure you set the timer to turn it off for you and ALWAYS make sure the timer is on so that your fan can take breaks. This fan needs its rest! Otherwise it’s a really great fan and I’m impressed by how fast it cools the room, I just took off two stars for changing of levels on its own and because it’s already acting weird so soon after purchasing. Again, I’m sure it was user error so just warning y’all
Works well but difficult assembling base. Doesn’t come in 1 piece. Instructions and controls are a bit confusing.
Thought it would blow harder only 4 speeds goes about 10 feet
aesthetically pleasing as it is effective. It’s quiet and has good airflow
It works okay,but i thought it would blow cooler air !

This fan is amazing but it broke after using it for 3 weeks. My apartment only has one A/C and it’s in the living room so I bought two to get the cold air back to my room. I do love the remote and how quiet it is but I might have to look into different brands especially if I’m paying $60 on a fan.

I bought two of Dreo fans, this one and a 42 inch high one. The 42 inch one is way more quieter for some reason. Level one and two are quiet but three and four are annoyingly noisy. Spend the twenty bucks more and get the nicer, quieter one. The breeze output is phenomenal though.

All the features advertised work, but when I run this fan on its quietest setting, there is a high pitched squeal that I can hear. It’s not loud but it’s noticeable. Very disappointing considering part of the advertising was that the thing runs quietly.

reviewTitle: Great Fan.. Just A little Short
reviewDescription: Great Fan! Cool and Quiet but will be returning because of the height. We have a taller bed and because of the fans height, it just blows on the mattress and box spring. I will be looking for something taller.

This fan does the job, blows air, oscillates fine, nice remote. It's a good size being 90". But it isn't very powerful, probably because it's a "quiet" fan. Not worth the price in my opinion, but an okay fan.

We have tried many fan in the past and we always had issues with durability and setup. This has by far been our favorite fan. Easy to setup and fairly quiet. We have now purchased multiple for different rooms in our house.

So I bought this for my bedroom. My hot flashes are pretty bad at night. I keep this at the foot of my bed.It's very quiet, all of the lights on the fan go out after a few, so no bright lights. The fan also has some pretty high settings, making it work great. I also ordered the white color so dust doesn't stick to it. So overall it's everything I wanted a fan! Highly recommended!!

reviewTitle: This fan is worth the cost
reviewDescription: This fan seems to push more air than even a standard oscillating fan. Even at setting one, there is a nice, gentle breeze. At setting 4, it really pushes some air! The remote is comprehensive, and the option to turn the beep notification settings off is always a win in my book. Especially when there's need for quiet. A small footprint for the entire fan. Just stick it in one corner of a room and try it!

Great fan. Blows cold air and the distance the air blows is great. It’s easy to use and I love that it has a remote too. Very stable on carpet. It is a little bit noisy but not something that bothers me.

reviewTitle: It is very quiet, and like the slim design.
reviewDescription: I read the reviews and decided to get this fan. I'm really glad I did. I like the slim design and the features it offers. It is quiet and have been getting many compliments on the both how quiet and the design.

reviewTitle: It's one of the best item I purchased this year.
reviewDescription: It's one of the best item I purchased this year. This is powerful. Only one thing I regret is the height. I hope this one can move verticallly. I can't reach my shoulder or head when I sit on a chair.

I was heavily influenced by TikTok about this fan, we don't have central AC in Alaska and despite what you may think, it gets HOT in the summer. This fan feels like AC, keeps me nice and cool. Worth every penny.

reviewTitle: Quiet, Amazing Air flow, minimal space!
reviewDescription: This is awesome. Feels like I have an AC going in my room! Great air flow, and it doesn't take up much space, and it looks great!Super easy to setup. Just connect the base stand, then plug and start!
This fan is very quiet, looks good and has many features.  I researched best fans and this was one that kept coming up on my searches.  Glad to say it is one of the best fans I’ve ever owned.

Love it for my pre-menopausal symptoms in my bedroom that is in direct sunlight and gives my AC the extra boost. I also love that it comes with a remote even though I don’t use it because I’m ALWAYS hot! 😭
Love the fan but gave it 3 stars because it has such a short cord and it could use a light up remote
Works ok, warranty registration is screwed up!  Different names and models than what’s shown on the box.  I’m not impressed!
Aesthetically pleasing compared to most fans but in the end it's just an oscillating fan.  Not really worth 70 bucks.
Nice fan except it is too low. Need a higher turning fan with more air. Doesn't even fill my whole room
I chose this fan for its quietness but after a couple of weeks we could hear the motor. It got louder.

The 1st purchase was great, quiet operation. This is the 2nd purchase. At the end of rotation range, it made door hinge like noise, which is very annoying. Inconsistent quality control. Added one more star. Dreo's warranty kicked in and sent me a replacement.

reviewTitle: Perfect in every way but the smell.
reviewDescription: Great amount of air on level 1 and level 4 in our family room. Extremely quiet on level one which is perfect for TV watching. But....ours smells like un-cured PVC pretty badly, if the smell goes away I may edit the review. Other than the smell, the fan is perfect, also love the feel of the control and the fact that the info is visible on the front and the display auto turns itself off. Really perfect except for the smell.
It’s advertised as a bedroom fan. It is NOT Quiet!It’s just an average fan and overpriced.

Everyone in the reviews is saying it’s like having an ACITS definitely not . It’s literally just a basic tower fan that blows mild air at best .I don’t think it’s powerful at allOnly thing I can say is it is pretty quiet.If you are looking for something to blow COOL air this is definitely not it . It just takes the warm air and blows it back at you

reviewTitle: It distributes air better than a traditional, round fan but it is NOT quiet
reviewDescription: If you don't care about noise, then this fan will cool you down fast.

When we removed our ceiling fan to install a nicer light and projector for the media room we needed that extra breeze when the AC wasn't enough. Live in the south so it gets pretty hot and humid. This fan works great for us as it oscillates and everyone in the room can get the extra breeze.

Mighty fan in terms of air flow and cooling.  Despite it not an air conditioner the output of cool air is impressive in an upstairs bedroom where temps are higher.  I appreciate the panel light goes dark after selections are made (especially at night).  Also, the unit is well designed aesthetically and easy to move from room to room.  I do not mind the beep when turning on/off or changing speeds.

I love how it swivels 90 degrees covering more airflow area than other brands which I currently own. Also notable to mention is how quite this tower is (compared of course to what I have now). I also like how the digital display turns off after a while so as not to distract you, me preferring to sleep in room that is as dark as possible. Happy camper here and ordering another one.

Previously had a Black & Decker extended fan that went out on me after around a year. Purchased this on Thursday, and recieved it today (Saturday). Directly out of the box this fan gives me an AC feel to the wind. I live in an apartment where even with AC on blast it still will get hot during the day time especially in my city. I don't often get the opportunity to give positive feedback because of a lot of hit or miss items I've ordered but if you are looking for a fan that has amazing performance right out the box, this is it. 5 STAR so far and I will update if need be.

I bought this fan for my son for Father's Day. He absolutely loves it! It's lightweight, easy to use (remote control available) and whatever setting you have it on, it's not loud like most fans! The first 2 settings are noiseless!He loves it so much that I just ordered one for myself!Great purchase and great price!

As a very light sleeper, I was looking for a quiet fan for my bedroom. After purchasing and returning two bladed fans that were too loud, I then discovered tower fans. After some research, I purchased this model for its versatility, ease of use, and the ability to clean it. I have not been disappointed. This fan works flawlessly. I can’t speak to its durability as this is a recent purchase, but I am very pleased so far. Would definitely recommend.

I purchased this fan for my living room in my 3rd fl apartment. This summer has been brutal and my a/c can barely keep up, but with this fan helping move the air around the temp is a comfortable 77 degrees cool. Its stability is solid on carpet as well as hardwood. The handle on the back top head is easy to access for adjustability. The led screen is also bright as well has a snooze function allowing it to turn off for complete darkness for bedrooms. Love it!

reviewTitle: Truly such a quiet, convenient fan!
reviewDescription: I’m so so pleased with how quiet this fan is! The only assembly is clicking 2 pieces together in order to form the circular base for the fan and it was EASY! The fan is light weight so it’s easy to grab and move around your house where you want it. I’m very happy with the simple but various blowing options and the remote is such a luxury! I totally recommend this fan!! I use it to create a summer breeze is my home during the summer months, mostly in my bedroom but also my den.

it was easy to assemble. It blows cold air all night in my recreation room where my 2 dogs like to sleep . When I put my ac on it blows cold air into my kitchen so its not so hot when I'm cooking. I' m definately getting another one. Its worth every penny

reviewTitle: I like this so much I bought a second one.
reviewDescription: I really like the features of this fan. Easy to put together. The oscillation and timer functions are awesome.  I leave it in front of my upstairs bedroom door to pull in cool air at night. The timer function is nice for this. The remote works well but it seems like you need to have the front of the fan facing you.  A small annoyance.  Really pleased with it.

This has provided a relief in my apartment space. Its set up in an odd way where the window unit is unable to reach my room and I've finally been able to sleep during this hot weather thanks to this fan. It doesn't work the way that I thought, but I think I was looking for more of a miracle. It works a lot better than the fans that I have set up. I do still need an additional fan to help cool down the space, but it does more than just push hot air around. It does provide some coolness to the space.The pressure of the air blown out is nice, as well. I've been easily moving it between rooms because sometimes the window unit is too loud and it's nice to have this instead. It's a nice replacement when there's not an excessive heat warning outside. Though while I do love it, my cats seem to be afraid of it. Not sure if it's the noise or the fact that it moves but they're slowly accepting the fan tower into their lives. At least, I don't have to worry about them knocking it over.

The fan works great and is a perfect substitute to keeping the A/C on all night. My only complaint would be the packaging. The box that it came in (not the amazon box, the box inside) was badly ripped and poorly taped. I wouldn't be surprised if the fan was a return. Like I said, so far it's been working great and nothing was missing so it's not a huge deal. It just would've been nice if the ripped box could've been replaced for shipping.

Update: reached out to the company and they are sending me a new one since this one stopped working (blowing) altogether. Great customer service!Bought this product on 4/19 (actually bought 2 of them) and one of them suddenly won’t blow air correctly anymore. It is not used every day and is turned off when not in use. I was using it on level 3 while sitting in the living room and it just suddenly stopped blowing much. Feels like it’s barely on number 1 no matter what level I select. Hopefully the second one stays working? But very disappointed for the amount spent for it to only last 2 months!!

This is a decent tower fan, but it makes a loud electronic beep sound when the on-off button is pushed. Very quiet sleep and #1 levels. The rotation moves slowly, which may be good or bad, depending on your preference and need. It seems to me that the slower the turn, the less forceful the air movement. Overall, I do like the slow turn.

Bought it for my son‘s bedroom under the recommendation of my air conditioner guy. My air conditioner guy came to service my AC and I told him that I was trying to keep the price down and my son was always complaining. It was too hot in his room. Bought this one and I’m very happy with it and so is my son!

I live in Florida and currently it’s hell season, to help combat the feeling of living in an oven I got this fan to keep me cool at night. It’s mostly quiet. If I have it at 2 or above you can’t hear it when it’s oscillating.  It lately 1 has been perfect. Unfortunately this means the fan doubles as a white noise machine of sped up croaking frogs. It also seems to be getting worse.The fan was super ready to set up. Easy to use. I love the little spot to store the remote. I do enjoy it overall. Just worried about the increasing noise.

I really like this fan! It has a lot of different settings for your comfort and a quiet operation. There are no annoying motor sounds, just comforting wind sounds. It’s light weight, but not cheap. The only thing I don’t like is the remote control, only because it’s very hard to see what’s on the buttons and it takes some time to figure out the various settings. Overall, the fan is great in helping keep our TV room cool here in the desert.

My likes: it has the basic  features Im looking for, that it's tall and moves a lot of air, noise is minimal but I'm 75 so some hearing impairment, the sound to me flows well no vibration or surge, the speed's 1-4, the rear grill comes off easily 1 screw and finger hole to lift and remove for cleaning, the timer 1-8 hours if you need a timer, sleep mode i guess for changing the speed high to low till you sleep and stay at level 1, auto mode adjustment of speed by temperature, natural mode alternating speed? Very portable cord length ok, pocket for remote, mine sets at foot of bed had to raise it 10 inches to get proper flow across bed, price ok for fan performance. My dislikes: On the fan led it does not stay on no option, it should at least show present settings, I think too many settings just me though, the remote is dark in color so finding it at night to change a setting not ok, the buttons are flat the on/off button is the only one that can be felt, a lot of tv remotes have leds or at the very least they have icon's youcan feel, so I would have to turn on light to change settings. The description says rear grill and blades are removable, this modle the blades are not removable even the instructions that came with it said use brush or vacuum to clean blades no where does it say anything about removing the blades for cleaning. I'm removing 1 star for fan led and remote also misprint about fan able to remove and clean, but would I buy again YES.

I'm very happy with the performance and design of this fan. My only complaint is that the electrical cord is really short. I don't like having a lot of extension cords, and my apartment doesn't have a lot of outlets, so the cord on this Dreo doesn't give me many placement options. But otherwise, it's just what I needed.

Just purchased our 2nd DREO Tower Fan and noticed this odd circle next to the number display that is nowhere to be found in the user manual, or any videos/photos posted by other users that have purchased this product.It doesn’t light up, doesn’t seem to serve any purpose really. But it does make one wonder just what even is it, and why does no one else appear to have it on their fan? It is very hard to notice unless you are very close up or you shine a light to the light up display.We have zoomed in on numerous photos and videos of this product, and as previously stated, have not found this to be on anyone else’s fan but ours.Can anyone shed some light on this?Just hoping it’s not one of those “secret camera” things!
Easy to put together. Look is nice. The air flow is not as strong as I hoped. It's a medium at best.It's quiet. Overall the product is satisfactory.
The speed of the fan is gray and puts out so much power. I love that it’s still super quiet and the accessibility with the remote is awesome.

I've uses this fan for a few weeks now and it's been amazing. Fairly quiet. Once it's cranked all the way up to 4, it puts out a nice strong wind but of course has the noise of a normal fan on HIGH. I don't have to turn it to that level for my bedroom though, I'm usually fine on the lowest level or one step up. Overall it's a great product and keeps my room nice and cool.
The fan works great. Very quiet! It is a little short. I like the night mode that turns off the screen light. The 7 hour time is convenient.
Lightweight and portable.  Easy ro use, love the remote.  Very quiet.  I use it all over the house for a great breeze. Would buy again.
Great fan, we have three of these. This one arrived but appears to have been previously opened. That said, it’s in great condition and works as intended.
works o.k. but high settings are loud. not 28db on low but closer to 34db, in my opinion. HFT-009 is what is needed for my family.

Threw away the manual with the box it comes in because its a fan it should be pretty basic to use, right?... Theres so much customization to this thing its a little overbearing. I just wanted a fan that oscillates and makes the room cold. This one can self regulate based on the air movement, has timers and a eco mode? Odd way to reinvent the wheel with some over engineering but I can respect it
My first came with a remote but my second did not. I guess they just need to check the boxing. Works great tho
Bought for a smaller bedroom and does the job. Thought I’d try this before investing a Dyson and it seems to be fine.
Like the fan.Total disaster because of non lit remote.
A regular circle blows better air than this
The remote does not work anymore after 3 months.

reviewTitle: Good Tower Fan but you must know something before you buy
reviewDescription: I bought this Tower Fan based on many good reviews about this product. I still say its a good product but you have to know that this kind of fan is not spreading cold air like air-condition  does. I can say its like air distributer whenever you turn on air condition in your area it helps to distribute cold air around the area you placed the tower fan but if your air condition is off then its just a normal air.Second thing do not be deceived by the voltage power that says to you that it works on 220 Volts power as mentioned in the question section. if you did then you will cause burns to your tower fan. So never plug it under this power. Read the catalogue very carefully for any device do not depend on amazon site or answers of question provided in product page!I put 3 stars because its a nice technology with a touch screen, can be set up in quiet mode, air distributor and unique design.Unfortunately, I couldn't enjoy using it. I got my refund very early.

I like that this product is hefty and looks stronger than similar products I could find in the local Target, Walmart or Walgreens. I find it to work better than expected and it has relived us of the discomfort caused by the heat of the summer in our area.

reviewTitle: Mostly great, but remote stopped working.
reviewDescription: Likes: Packaging and instructions made me feel welcome and supported by the company. The fan is very quiet yet powerful. The build quality felt excellent on both of the fans I bought. Features are great and I love the "touch screen".Dislikes: One of the fans stopped receiving the remote signal after only two months of use. The red light on it DOES turn on when buttons are pressed, but the fan itself doesn't respond. It's sad because the remote felt of really great quality.Conclusion: I paid for a remote controlled fan that in two months turned into a manually controlled fan. 😮‍💨 I don't feel like returning it is worth the hassle. The other Dreo fan is working great so far.

reviewTitle: O it’s okay but not good enough
reviewDescription: If you need to have a non-noisy fan this is for you. However, the unit itself does not blow strong enough air for the speed it has. I don’t not value this at this point

This fan I now have in my room has become a reliable addition, especially during warmer days. Its impressive ability to circulate air effectively cools my bedroom, creating a comfortable atmosphere. The fair trade-off between price and quality makes it a worthwhile investment for anyone seeking a cost-effective cooling solution. my only minor gripe is the speed at which it collects dust. Despite this, I'm delighted with the fan's performance and the noticeable impact it has on maintaining a pleasant environment in my room.
It did not circulate the air enough for me.

reviewTitle: Not too loud, but not very cooling.
reviewDescription: Was looking for a fan to have on at night that wasn’t so loud that it would keep me up at night because I’m a very light sleeper and have a hard enough time falling asleep. This fan was perfect for that. It’s not that noisy at all. It’s a steady silent hum. But after a while of use I’ve definitely noticed that it doesn’t really do it’s job of cooling down a room. You can only feel the air if you’re right up next to it which is very disappointing. The air that comes from it isn’t even that cold and it’s always kept on the highest setting. In my bedroom we have both the ceiling fan and this fan on at night but it gets so humid with the main source of “cool” air being the window AC that also doesn’t do its job and doesn’t even circulate through the whole apartment. But anyway, the air quality of this fan is fine in the winter, but pretty much fails to do its job when it gets hot outside.

I bought this fan because of all the positive reviews. But it barely makes a difference in the humid Caribbean heat. At the highest level it doesn't keep me cool unless I'm right next to it. It is very quiet but not worth the money.
When I first got this I loved it! But I noticed the fan doesn’t blow out air as powerful as it did when I first got it. I cleaned it and made sure it was on a good power outlet.
I’m either stupid or this is false advertising because this is literally just an expensive fan I could’ve gotten from anywhere else but I thought it was one of those free standing AC units.

reviewTitle: Doesn't blow cold air at all
reviewDescription: Nice fan, quiet, sleek, has remote, but literally blows hot air...I knew it wasn't an a/c unit but I thought at least the air would be slightly cool...but no it's not 🥵😬..not worth $70+

reviewTitle: Not as strong as I hoped.
reviewDescription: Even at its highest level it is not that strong and I have to be directly in front of it to cool down. It does look nice though and is easy to use.

reviewTitle: Not as tall or as good or as versatile as the Black one.
reviewDescription: I decided to buy this in a different color since i had already bought a black one that I keep in my bedroom. I was thinking this one would be the same height as the Black one but it isn't . Its smaller and has four speeds to it instead of six like the black one has. I was thinking and hoping this would be equal to the black one that I already owned. Anyway it's gets the job done for now and I can get away with having it because i have central air in case it gets humid in the upcoming months.

I got this fan after Amazon says this is the best selling quite fan. Well I can tell you the term quite must be subjective because it has an annoying and very noticeable motor/bearing noise. The noise is most noticeable on the lowest setting aka sleep. When it gets to the high speeds it disappears.Does the fan put off good air absolutely does it feel good yes. I do like the fact that the fan has the ability to turn off the beep ment to wake a deaf person. The screen is easily visible with even one eye half cracked when waking to feed the baby.

reviewTitle: Started strong but is wearing thin.
reviewDescription: Strong and quiet at first. We are a few months in and the noise is noticeable now. Still blows a good stream of air.
I bought 4 of these fans and regret it. They are not very strong. Way better fans for cheaper on the market.
I was under the impression this would at least go down to 65 Fahrenheit, but it doesn’t even get close
